about_the_game:
Vanyar Survivors is a Roguelite survivor game where every run features unique skill and equipment drops, providing fresh challenges for each adventure. The game incorporates classic dark-themed systems like forging, shops, achievements, and sacred artifacts, experiencing endless battles and strategic combinations.

Protect the Last Sanctuary

The Vanyar, the noble elves, flourished for millennia in the Blessed Land, a sanctuary forged with divine aid. Yet, a creeping darkness corrupted their mightiest defenders, birthing the monstrous Dark Fallen and bringing their civilization to ruin. Now, as the last of your kin, you must defend the final sanctuary, gather survivors, forge sacred relics, and challenge the Dark Fallen King to restore the Vanyar's lost glory.

Blessings of the High Elves

Six High Elves guard you throughout your journey, each bestowing unique abilities to help you craft a distinctive combat style in the dark world.

Multiple hero selection

A variety of heroes to choose from, offering different progression systems, unlocking skins, and having your own unique charm.

Vanquish the Dark Fallen, Forge Legendary Artifacts

Dive into dark-themed exploration and combat, featuring loot drops, shops, and a forging system. Strengthen yourself through endless challenges and create your ultimate sacred artifact.

Forge the Ultimate Skill Build, Face the Dark Fallen

Every run places you in new crises, with over 40 powerful blessings to enhance your combat abilities rapidly. Build the ultimate skill set and face the Dark Fallen in a quest to protect the final sanctuary.

More content awaits your discovery—stay tuned!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains  blood, mildly nudity, and suggestive themes

name: Vanyar Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700 or AMD™ Ryzen 7 3700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A dark-themed Roguelike survivor game where you must withstand relentless waves of enemies, craft powerful skill builds, unlock new survivors, and take on dark bosses. Claim sacred artifacts and experience an unparalleled thrill of intense combat and ultimate destruction!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
